{"session_header":"[SESSION_HEADER]
Timestamp: Year 1, Midday, 12:05:00
Location: Athenaeum of Whispered Tomes - Main Reading Hall
Status: Lvl 1 Fighter | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300","narrative":"Noon (12:05:00) finds you wandering among the towering shelves of the main reading hall. The书架 stretch upward beyond the reach of the collapsible ladders propped against each aisle, their leather spines cracked with age, each title promising secrets of creation itself.

You run your fingers along the dusty volumes. Most are mundane—histories of fallen kingdoms, agricultural treatises, poetry collections from long-dead bards. But then something catches your eye.

A thin volume wedged between two massive tomes bears no title on its spine. Its cover is plain black leather, unnaturally smooth to the touch. As you pull it free, you notice the pages are blank—every single one. Yet when you hold it up to the light, faint shadows seem to ripple beneath the surface, as if something moves within.

Nearby, a plaque identifies this section as "Acquisitions Unverified—Contents Pending Classification."

The elderly librarian watches you from his desk, his magnified eyes gleaming with interest. "Finding something interesting?" he calls out, his voice echoing softly through the vaulted chamber.","planning_block":{"thinking":"Aric found a mysterious blank book that seems to have some kind of magical life to it. The librarian seems willing to talk more.
